Blackbox Country Ambassadors

Our 18 country ambassadors refer and endorse candidates for our programs

Agustin Badano
Argentina

Coming from the financial and investment world now I'm an entrepreneur...and I love it! I'm co-founder of Empreware, where we offer web apps that help small business owners in Latin America to manage the financial of their businesses.

Michael Overell
Australia

Cofounder of @RecruitLoop. Ex-corporate, startup fanatic. Likes surf, coffee, outdoor exertion. Blogging on Moverell. Say g'day.

Matías Fontecilla
Chile

Co-Founder of BenchBanking, the financial platform that helps customers make smart decisions to achieve their dreams. I am a passionate entrepreneur and believe that the internet revolution is in our hands. We will drive the changes in the world that will be remembered 200 hundred years from now.

Conno Christou
Cyprus

Co-founder at Avocarrot. Passionate about mobile advertising and app monetization. Violin and guitar player. Terrible with directions too.

Ismael Nzouetom
France

Entrepreneur, Founder of I-Dispo, the platform that turns your smartphone or your car into a personal concierge.

Richard Phan
France

Co-founder of ZenDay, the personal timeline that helps you improve your time management skills. Passionate about entrepreneurship, deeply multi-cultural, I love to help others reach their dreams.

Jenny Jung
Germany

COO at Factory Berlin, previously a partnership manager at Blackbox.

Steffen Reitz
Germany

Entrepreneur at heart, technology embracer, artificial intelligence builder and machine learning fanatic.

Martins Kalnins
Latvia

Business guy. I always try to look at things from a different angle.

Girts Laudaks
Latvia

Product guy. Friend. Boss. Go-to guy. Most of the time I keep things simple and get things done.

Ali Rehan
Pakistan

I'm a geek and an entrepreneur! I love gadgets, technology, photography and cycling. CEO and co-founder of Groopic

Rafah Alkhatib
Saudi Arabia

Mother x3 and wife, social media enthusiast, contributing to the development of a healthy generation in the Middle East.

Ivana Gadjanski
Serbia

PhD, Fulbright and TED Fellow, co-founder and Chief scientific officer of Pubsonic, a startup accelerating scientific discovery by turning search into research. I am also a co-founder of the non-profit organization FAB Initiative, providing support, education and networking opportunities to female students and entrepreneurs in STEM field in South East Europe.

Vladan Petrovic
Serbia

Tech co-founder of Pubsonic, a scientific data search engine accelerating scientific discovery. I love building great products from the idea up, and helping startups from around the world to connect to right developers.

Matt Tagg
South Africa

Entrepreneur, Hacker. Founder of telecoms companies, @webafrica and @teracoDC. Currently working on psychology/tech startup in Palo Alto.

Krating Poonpol
Thailand

Bringing Silicon Valley to Thailand

Ruben Timmerman
The Netherlands

I am passionate about helping people learn both with Springest, the biggest learning marketplace in Europe, as well as personally. I am a mentor for Amsterdam based Rockstart accelerator. Before founding Springest, I made a living out of blogging, training and speaking at conferences about user experience design and online marketing.

Nikolay Pavlov
Ukraine

Dreamer, serial entrepreneur and simply curious man. Currently focused on Mobile Media business. Created solutions in e-commerce and real estate industry, as well as webhosting, ISP's and datacenters management.
